front.title: Blaster Rack
front.gametext: Deploy on your side of table. At any time, you may transfer one of your character weapons from any site to the Blaster Rack. During your deploy phase, weapon may be transferred to your character on table for an expenditure of Force equal to the weapon's deploy cost.
front.lore: Imperial facilities like the Death Star and garrison bases have blaster racks at key locations to equip soldiers with weapons like blaster rifles and thermal detonators.

rulings: Weapons on Blaster Rack are inactive.
Placing a weapon on Blaster Rack is a top-level action.
